channel.title: If only I had the money for...
channel.description:
Post what you'd get if you could buy it, game/tech wise ofc!
I MUST HAVE:
The Logitech G19 Gaming KB [url='https://www.logitech.com/en-us/gaming/mice-keyboard-combos/devices/4956']https://www.logitech.com/en-us/gaming/mice-keyboard-combos/devices/4956[/url]
Their G930 Gaming Headset!!!! [url='https://www.logitech.com/en-us/gaming/headsets/devices/7248']https://www.logitech.com/en-us/gaming/headsets/devices/7248[/url]
And to complete the set, their G700 Gaming Mouse [url='https://www.logitech.com/en-us/gaming/mice-keyboard-combos/devices/7244']https://www.logitech.com/en-us/gaming/mice-keyboard-combos/devices/7244[/url]
If you can get me these items, I will sell you my body for a year.
Btw, I don't know if all that gear has enough possible key binds in all!

item.title: If only I had the money for...
item.dc:creator: Shinobi
item.description:
I’d get a PS3. I hate not having a console.

Read full topic

item.title: If only I had the money for...
item.dc:creator: mankyman6
item.description:
Zageron:

Id I had the money I would help expand the research in ‘speed of light’ computing and graphene technology, so that we could get faster computers sooner.

Actually, a processor that uses light to operate has recently been invented. Expensive? Unbelievably. Fast? Exponentially.

Read full topic

item.source: If only I had the money for...

item.title: If only I had the money for...
item.dc:creator: Texter
item.description:
Maxey:

I just fucking love the sound they make.

That’s the part you’ll never get. Even at a critical stage of finishing Aliens, James Cameron was in the sound booth, dicking around to get that sound effect just right. I don’t think they sell M1A1’s with a phaser pedal (to get a submachine gun with that Eddie van Halen sound lol) attached to them. An extra reason to want to see Aliens: Colonial Marines finished and released.

Read full topic

item.source: If only I had the money for...

item.title: If only I had the money for...
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Maxey:

Make that two.

I just fucking love the sound they make.

Man, me too. There’s a mod for L4D from fpsbanana to turn the M-16 into an M41A. Installed it and then just turned the pitch up in the settings, added a little variance…got it almost exactly perfect. So much fun to use against waves of zombies.

Also, if you can’t get your hands on an original, if you’ve got $900 lying around you might consider one of these:

https://www.hollywood-collectibles.com/aliens.html

And a website dedicated to the gun:

https://www.m41a.com/

EDIT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=87l61NxTsUA

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T_dlAmBkr10

Read full topic
